key.name: tasklist-window-width
key.description: Sets the width of the task list window in pixels.

key.name: persist-tasks
key.description: Whether to save and load tasks across GNOME Shell sessions.

key.name: enable-previews
key.description: If true, task previews will be shown on hover.

key.name: max-preview-size
key.description: The maximum size of the preview window in pixels.

key.name: hover-time
key.description: The time in milliseconds before the task preview appears.
